attributes.action: Stop ignoring Petitions and listen to what the public want.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is apparently clear that this web site is just another PR gimmic. The government should read these petitions and react accordingly. Not just giving it lip service. Sign This petition and let the goverment prove otherwise.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
